name: SquareRun (Ytakeodown)
description:
Hi this is the first game i am uploading in itch.io so there might be some bugs and i hope you will be able to understand that. It would be very helpful for you to donate to me as i want to start uploading games to google play store with the money that i earn from the games im uploading in itch.io so if you have donated to me than thank you but you dont have to donate if you dont want to im not forcing you.

Anyhow i am only uploading the Android one as for Apple phones it needs some fixing so look forward to it. I hope you enjoy the game if there is anything you would want to suggest for this game please let me know thanks very much!!
